MemoryInfobox.description: 'While athletes traditionally competed naked, they still had equipment that needed to be looked after. Missing javelins were reported after a series of thefts.'

General_Description: '''Under Geared''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: An athlete drew Kassandra's attention to the [[Thief|thieves]] in the city.
Section_Dialogue:
*'''Kassandra:''' Chaire,'' friend. Anything a [[mercenary]] can do for you?''
*'''Athlete:''' ''Is nothing safe from thieves in this city? Even the athletic equipment has been stolen.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''What equipment? Most of the athletes I've seen barely wear clothes.''
*'''Athlete:''' ''The javelins,'' misthios''. Stop thinking about naked athletes and help us with these thieves!''

<tabber>
|-|You want the supplies brought back to you.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You want me to get it from the bandits?''
*'''Athlete:''' ''It should be an easy task for someone with your talent.''
|-|You want them all killed.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''
*'''Athlete:''' ''
</tabber>
(Accept – I'll bring it to you.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm the one for the job.''
*'''Athlete:''' ''Braver than you look. Good luck.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll come back when I'm done.''
Kassandra left the athlete, and sought out the bandits' camp. Within, she found the missing javelin, and returned to the athlete.
*'''Athlete:''' ''Did you get it?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It's all yours.''
*'''Athlete:''' ''Job well done, mercenary. Here, this is yours.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''All in a day's work.''
The athlete rewarded Kassandra for her help.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra helped an athlete with their problem, and was rewarded with [[drachma]]e.
